mapper.select: SELECT TP.ID, TC.MEMBER_ID, TP.PRODUCT_NAME, TP.PRODUCT_PRICE, TP.PRODUCT_REAL_PRICE, TP.PRODUCT_CODE, TP.PRODUCT_DATE, TP.PRODUCT_STOCK, TP.PRODUCT_DETAIL, TP.PRODUCT_IMAGE1, TP.PRODUCT_IMAGE2, TP.PRODUCT_IMAGE3, TP.PRODUCT_IMAGE4, TP.PRODUCT_ANIMAL, TP.PRODUCT_CATEGORY, TP.PRODUCT_COLOR, TP.PRODUCT_SIZE FROM TBL_CART TC JOIN TBL_PRODUCT TP ON TC.PRODUCT_ID = TP.ID AND TC.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_CART(ID, MEMBER_ID, PRODUCT_ID) VALUES (SEQ_CART.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{productId})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TBL_CART WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{productId} AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
